con:part.con:content:
<!--Name: UMMService_ZM Version: 1.0 Author: Wipro Comments: Initial Version
Version Description 1.0 Created the WSDL with 4 operation for Mobile Money -Third Party System integration--> <definitions name="UMMServiceService" targetNamespace="http://b2b.mobilemoney.mtn.zm_v1.0/" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd" xmlns:wsp="http://www.w3.org/ns/ws-policy" xmlns:wsp1_2="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/09/policy" xmlns:wsam="http://www.w3.org/2007/05/addressing/metadata" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://b2b.mobilemoney.mtn.zm_v1.0/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soapenc="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"> <types> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://b2b.mobilemoney.mtn.zm_v1.0/" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="processRequest" type="tns:processRequest"/> <xs:element name="processRequestResponse" type="tns:processRequestResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="processRequest"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="serviceId" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="parameter" type="tns:parameter" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="20"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="parameter"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="30"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="value" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="140"/> <xs:pattern value="([A-Za-z0-9_+:, .{\-}])*"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="processRequestResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="return" type="tns:parameter" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="20"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> </types> <message name="DepositMobileMoneyRequest"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:processRequest"/> </message> <message name="DepositMobileMoneyResponse"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:processRequestResponse"/> </message> <portType name="UMMService"> <!--Used by Third Party System for Fund Transfer / Reversal to the subscriber's Mobile Money Account--> <operation name="DepositMobileMoney"> <input message="tns:DepositMobileMoneyRequest" wsam:Action="http://b2b.mobilemoney.mtn.ug_v1.0/UMMService/DepositMobileMoneyRequest"/> <output message="tns:DepositMobileMoneyResponse" wsam:Action="http://b2b.mobilemoney.mtn.ug_v1.0/UMMService/DepositMobileMoneyResponse"/> </operation> </portType> <binding name="UMMServicePortBinding" type="tns:UMMService"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="DepositMobileMoney"> <soap:operation soapAction="POST"/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> </binding> <service name="UMMServiceService"> <port name="UMMServicePort" binding="tns:UMMServicePortBinding"> <soap:address location="http://10.0.152.65:8080/ThirdPartyServiceUMMImpl/UMMServiceService"/> </port> </service> </definitions>
